original_text: I will punish both the prophet and the person who asked him for a message. They will both have the same punishment.
korean_text: 선지자의 죄악과 그에게 묻는 자의 죄악이 같은즉 각각 자기의 죄악을 담당하리니

sentences.original_text: I will punish both the prophet
and the person who asked him for a message
They will both have the same punishment
sentences.korean_translation: 그 둘은 동일한 벌을 받을 것이다
